IT Planet

For Digital Services

Leading The Power Of A Network

ABOUT US

What IT Planet DS

Can Offer To Your Business?

Internet Services

Reliable, High-quality internet
Upload = Download

Read More

Software

We are providing Software Solutions
Microsoft - Firewall - Virtualization
Backup - Endpoint - Graphic

Read More

Hardware

We're providing any hardware
Laptop - PC - Workstation - Switch
Router - Access point - Access Point

Read More
812

Happy Clients

948

Total Projects

17

Partners

20

Area Coverage

Our Best Services

Some of the most famous services in IT Planet DS

Firewall

Read More

A firewall is software or firmware that prevents unauthorized access to a network. It inspects incoming and outgoing traffic using a set of rules to identify and block threats.

Go

Endpoint

Read More

Endpoint Protection is the practice of protecting the various endpoints on a network such as laptops, smartphones, tablet computers and other end-user devices.

Go

VOIP

Read More

Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) is a proven technology that lets anyone place phone calls over an internet connection. With the rise of broadband.

Go

Leased Line

Read More

dedicated, fixed-bandwidth data connection. It allows data-hungry businesses to have a reliable, high-quality internet connection with guarantees of upload and download speed.

Go

Backup

Read More

Backup and recovery describes the process of creating and storing copies of data that can be used to protect organizations against data loss. This is sometimes referred to as operational recovery.

Go

Cloud Computing

Read More

Simply put, cloud computing is the delivery of computing services—including servers, storage, databases, networking, software, analytics, and intelligence.

Go

Take a look at

Our Special Partners

IT Planet DS - We have contracted with the most powerful companies to
provide you with all the services without complicat

Few Words About

IT Planet for Digital Service

IT Planet DS specializes in the area of Information Technology, providing total information solutions to its customers starting from corporate and public accounts, government sector, defense authorities and ending with individual customers

About Us

Giving your business a

Great Network & Security

IT Planet DS offers a full spectrum of Hardware solutions, Software licenses and services. We work in partnership with our clients to optimize organizational performance and human capital. The scale of projects can range from small to a national-wide consultation.

want to know more about products ?

Visit our Youtube

There is a video for each product we provide in IT Planet DS
